WH.CannotDeleteItemEffect: Этот эффект связан с предметом актёра. Удалите предмет или эффект у предмета.
WH.ItemsNotAllowed: Этот предмет не может быть добавлен этому типу актёра.
WH.DiffDescription: 'Разница' представляет собой изменения, которые необходимо внести в исходный предмет. Это можно сделать вручную или сгенерировать, перетащив предмет того же типа.

BugReporter.Title: Сообщить об ошибке
BugReporter.APIReached: Вы достигли лимита использования API GitHub. Вам придется либо подождать час перед отправкой, либо отправить ошибку вручную на сайте GitHub.
BugReporter.NotUpdated: Эти модули Warhammer не обновлены до последних версий
BugReporter.PostSuccess: Сообщение об ошибке отправлено! Ссылка в консоли.
BugReporter.PostError: Не удалось отправить отчёт об ошибке. Проверьте консоль.
BugReporter.BugReportNameError: Введите ваше имя в Discord или Email.
BugReporter.Troubleshooting: Перед сообщение об ошибке, посмотрите страницу Решения проблем.
BugReporter.Warning: Внимание: Эта информация будет опубликована на странице GitHub, которая является публичной. Поэтому рекомендуется использовать имя в Discord, а не ваш Email. Иначе напишите мне (Moo Man) лично.
BugReporter.DescriptionPlaceholder: Что случилось, как воспроизвести и т.д.
BugReporter.ManyModules: У вас есть модули, не являющиеся официальными. Может ошибка возникает из-за них? Попробуйте отключить все модули, не являющиеся официальными модулями Warhammer.
BugReporter.AlertHint: This report either wasn't reproducible or needs some more information. Click on the title to see details.

Choice.CreateOptionDetails:
What kind of option?

Placeholder: An Item that has no data associated it besides its name, will be created as an Equipment type Item

Filter: Define filters to provide a selection of Items

Initialization.DeleteModuleContentPrompt:
WARNING: This will delete all content associated with the {id} module that has been imported in this world.

Are you sure you wish to proceed?

WH.DeleteEffectHint: Delete the Active Effect after running this script.
WH.ErrorNoZones: No Zones to select. Add Regions to the Scene to create Zones.
WH.ErrorUnableToFindEffect: Unable to find effect to apply.
WH.PickZone: Pick the Zone you wish to apply the Active Effect to.

TransferData.TransferTypeHint: Configure how the Active Effect is transferred or applied.
TransferData.DocumentTypeHint: What Document to apply the Active Effect to
TransferData.AvoidTestHint: Define a Test that, if passed, prevents the effect from being added. Item indicates the effect should take test data defined by the Item (if available). Custom allows you to define the test properties here. Script lets you write an entirely custom script that, if it returns true, prevents the effect.
TransferData.PreventionHint: Prevents this effect from being applied if the Test is passed.
TransferData.ReversedHint: Instead, prevent this effect when the test is failed.
TransferData.TransferredAuraHint: Apply this Aura to a target (or self) instead of constantly to self
TransferData.RenderAuraHint: Render the aura on the Canvas as a Measured Template
TransferData.KeepHint: Prevents removing the effect upon leaving the Area
TransferData.TemplateDataHint: Configure template data, such as color or texture
TransferData.TestIndependentHint: If checked, this Effect can be called directly from the owning Actor's sheet, instead of from chat
TransferData.PreApplyScriptHint: This executes before an effect is applied - this runs on the source, not the target. Return false to prevent application (Damage, Target, and Area/Zone only).
TransferData.EquipTransferHint: Only transfer this effect when it is equipped.
TransferData.EnableScriptHint: Condition for whether the effect should be enabled or disabled.
TransferData.FilterHint: Script to filter the Documents to apply Active Effect to. Should return true to prevent application.
TransferData.PromptHint: Provide a prompt and choose which document to Active Effect. Can be used with Filter to narrow the selection.
TransferData.SelfOnlyHint: This effect should only be applied to the owning Actor, instead of Targets.
TransferData.SkipImmediatePlacementHint: Prevents Immediate scripts from running when the effect is placed.
TransferData.ZoneTypeHint: Zone Effect means the effect is tied to the zone, Tokens in Zone means it applies to all Tokens in that Zone, Follow Token means it applies to whatever zone the targeted Token is in

ApplyTooltips.Self: Applies the Effect to the source Actor
ApplyTooltips.Target: Applies the Effect to the targets of the action or the tokens currently targeted.
ApplyTooltips.Area: Place an Area Template for the Effect, applying to tokens within.
ApplyTooltips.Zone: Select a Zone to apply this Effect to, applying to tokens within.

Warning.RenderAuraChange: To reflect the change to Render Aura, disable and re-enable the source Effect, or replace the Token on the Scene.

Error.LibraryOutaded: The Warhammer Library is out of date. {system} defines the minimum version library version to be {minimum}.
Error.ID: ID for {name} already exists in collection. This Document has been given a unique ID.
Error.CreateZoneEffect: Effects must be created via an Active Effect with the 'Zone' Transfer Type
